name: math_ext
summary: Extended math functions: trigonometry, logarithms, rounding, and constants.
use_when: User needs trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan)
User needs pi, e, or other mathematical constants
User wants rounding, floor, ceiling operations
avoid_when: User only needs basic arithmetic (use core +, -, *, / instead)
User needs random numbers (use random module instead)
